contentrichtext.text: [[Image:HISC.jpg|thumb|300px|right|The old club house. Now replaced.]] Located on an isolated sandy [[peninsula]] known as "Sandy Point," at the entrance to [[Chichester Harbour]], [[England]], the '''[[Hayling Island]] Sailing Club''', was founded in 1921. The "old" club house was built in 1936. The club built a new club house in 2003, which was inaugurated by HRH [[Anne, Princess Royal|The Princess Royal]]. Nearby waters can be used as a mock-[[Olympic Games|Olympic]] track, and regular classes are held to teach the basics of [[sailing]]. see: [[Hayling Island]] ==External links== * [http://www.hisc.co.uk Official site] [[Category:Yacht clubs in Hampshire]] [[Category:Sport in Hampshire]] [[Category:1921 establishments in England]] [[Category:Sports clubs established in 1921]] {{England-org-stub}} {{England-sport-stub}}
